name: BASED Escape from area 52½
description:
Rag 'n' Bone Studios presents Based, a humorous 3D rag-doll shooter set deep in the depths of a secret military base. You play as the captured alien Zid. Fight your way out of the bizarre and dangerous Area 52½ using a variety of ridiculous weaponry...

Can you help Zid escape?

Will you uncover the secrets of the base?

What can you do in the low-gravity chaos?

Enjoy the fun, frenetic action of this rag-doll based shooter. Where you never quite know what might happen next, as the controlled chaos of physics simulation fights back with as much energy as your opponents.

Download now to begin your wacky alien adventure!

----

Standard controls:

 WASD to move,

 Spacebar to jump,

 Left mouse button to fire.

E to pickup gun.

C to use telekinesis (pick up helmet and put near first door panel to escape) or grab enemies.
